column1: ['The field was founded on the assumption that human intelligence "can be so precisely described that a machine can be made to simulate it".'

column3: AI-related M&A in 2017 was over 25 times as large as in 2015.The study of non-learning artificial neural networks began in the decade before the field of AI research was founded

'Artificial intelligence was founded as an academic discipline in 1955
column2: and in the years since has experienced several waves of optimism

column1: 'When access to digital computers became possible in the mid-1950s
column2: AI research began to explore the possibility that human intelligence could be reduced to symbol manipulation.'
